17: וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then he said</n> אֵלַי֮ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>unto me Hast thou seen</n> בֶן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[this] O son</n> אָדָם֒ <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> הֲנָקֵל֙ <sup>7043 </sup> <n>A thing</n> לְבֵ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>to the house</n> יְהוּדָ֔ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> מֵעֲשׂ֕וֹת <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that they commit</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַתּוֹעֵב֖וֹת <sup>8441 </sup> <n>the abominations</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> עָֽשׂוּ־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>which they commit</n> פֹ֑ה <sup>6311 </sup> <n>here</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> מָלְא֨וּ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>here? for they have filled</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הָאָ֜רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> חָמָ֗ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>with violence</n> וַיָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and have returned</n> לְהַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <sup>3707 </sup> <n>to provoke me to anger</n> וְהִנָּ֛ם <sup>2005 </sup> <n>behold</n> שֹׁלְחִ֥ים <sup>7971 </sup> <n>and lo they put</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַזְּמוֹרָ֖ה <sup>2156 </sup> <n>the branch</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אַפָּֽם׃ <sup>639 </sup> <n>to their nose</n>
18: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>indeed</n> אֲנִי֙ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Therefore will I also deal</n> בְחֵמָ֔ה <sup>2534 </sup> <n>in fury</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>no</n> תָח֥וֹס <sup>2347 </sup> <n>shall not spare</n> עֵינִ֖י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>mine eye</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אֶחְמֹ֑ל <sup>2550 </sup> <n>neither will I have pity</n> וְקָרְא֤וּ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>and though they cry</n> בְאָזְנַי֙ <sup>241 </sup> <n>in mine ears</n> ק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>voice</n> גָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>with a loud</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> אֶשְׁמַ֖ע <sup>8085 </sup> <n>[yet] will I not hear</n> אוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>853 </sup>
